message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $7500 is a good offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $8250.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm still willing to negotiate, but I think the product is worth more than $7000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm open to discussing the details.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit below my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $7500?
